Hi,

> For eg: I want to test one method which will execute a complex query 
> and returns a list of records.
>         the size of the return list may vary.

Why does the search result vary?
Don't you set up the data base with exactly the content you need?

> In testcase I coded like this
> 
>    List  myList = dao.findAll();
>   assertTrue("No records found",myList .size() >0)

Your test shows a problem in your code.
It returns null instead of an empty list.
Congratulations!
Now you can fix the code.

Cheers,

Robert
